Venue Hire

Venue Specs

Our Bristol venue is available for private hire Friday through Wednesday, offering two versatile spaces designed with music lovers and modern creatives in mind. Both rooms feature a raised stage, a high‑spec audio system, dynamic effects lighting, and a dedicated bar serving an extensive drinks menu. Projection and visual‑effects options can also be arranged to suit your event.

The space is built to adapt — we regularly host everything from product launches, fashion showcases, fitness sessions, private parties, and live music events, to theatre performances and even film shoots. Whatever you’re planning, the venue can be shaped around your vision.

As an independent venue, we’re able to stay flexible with our packages and tailor our offering to suit your needs. Whatever you’re planning, we’re here to help bring it to life.

Main Room Capacity: 700 Standing | 200 Theatre | 130 Seated
Licensed Hours: 12:00 – 04:00
Age Restrictions: 16+ Monday to Sunday before 11pm and 18+ at all other times

Our Story

For the past twenty years, our venue has stood at the heart of Bristol’s cultural landscape. What began as a small independent space with a passion for live music has grown into a cornerstone of the city’s creative community — a place where artists, fans, and locals come together to celebrate Bristol’s unmistakable energy.

From day one, our mission has been simple: to raise the profile of local talent and give emerging artists a platform to be heard. Over two decades, we’ve welcomed countless performers through our doors — from first‑time acts finding their voice to established names returning to the city that shaped them. Our stages have become a launchpad for creativity, collaboration, and the raw, unpolished brilliance that defines Bristol’s music scene.
